typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ac_registration as string,
		end_time as string,
		eqp_sched_id as short,
		is_deleted as boolean,
		notes as string,
		start_time as string,
		status_code as string,
		status_description as string,
		status_name as string,
		updated_at as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> AzureBlob
RenameColumns derive(ADF_TIME_STMP = currentTimestamp(),
		ADF_RUN_ID = '') ~> AddADFColumns
AzureBlob select(mapColumn(
		AC_RGSTRN = ac_registration,
		END_TIME = end_time,
		EQP_SCHED_ID = eqp_sched_id,
		IS_DELD = is_deleted,
		NOTE = notes,
		STRT_TIME = start_time,
		STS_CD = status_code,
		STS_DESC = status_description,
		STS_NAME = status_name,
		UPDTD_AT = updated_at
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameColumns
AddADFColumns sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
